articles.title: America's Cup: Former Team New Zealand sailor Brad Butterworth tipped to skipper Alinghi for next Cup challenge - New Zealand Herald

articles.title: As U.S. Nears 800,000 Virus Deaths, 1 of Every 100 Older Americans Has Perished - The New York Times
articles.description: They are among the most vaccinated groups, but people 65 and older make up about three-quarters of the nation’s coronavirus death toll.
